How to install and remove software.

chapter.title: What is Software Center?
chapter.para: Software Center is a virtual catalog of thousands of free applications and other software to make your computer more useful.
Pode atopar o software por categorías ou por busca, e pode instalar un elemento premendo un botón.
Tamén pode examinar o software instalado no seu equipo actualmente, e eliminar todo o que xa non necesite.

chapter.title: Instalando software
chapter.para: To install something with Software Center, you need administrator access and a working Internet connection. (If you set up the operating system on this computer yourself, you have administrator access automatically.)

listitem.para: Na sección Obter software, busque aquelo que queira instalar, Se vostede xa coñece o nome do que quere, escriba o nome no campo de busca. Ou tente buscar por un tipo de programa como o que vostede quere como “folls de cálculo”). Ou senon, navegue pola lista de categorias.
Seleccione o elemento na lista e elixa Máis información.
Choose Install. You may need to enter the administrative password before the installation can begin.

chapter.para: O tempo que leva unha instalación depende do grande que sexa, da velocidade do seu computador e da conexión a Internet.
Cando a pantalla cambia a «instalado», o software está listo para o seu uso.

chapter.title: Usando un programa no momento de que está instalado
chapter.para: Pode iniciar a maioría dos programas que ten instalados desde o menú Aplicativos. (As utilidades para cambiar as preferencias poden aparecer en SistemaPreferencias ou SistemaAdministración no seu lugar).

To find out where to launch a new program, navigate to the screen for that program Software Center, if it is not still being displayed. The menu location should be displayed on that screen, below the colored bar.

chapter.title: Desinstalando software
chapter.para: To remove software, you need administrator access. (If you set up the operating system on this computer yourself, you have administrator access automatically.)

listitem.para: Na sección Software instalado busque o elemento que desexa desinstalar.
Select the item in the list, and choose Remove. You may need to enter the administrative password.

chapter.para: Se un programa está aberto ao desinstalalo, polo xeral manterase aberto despois de ser desinstalado. Unha vez que o peche, xa non estará dispoñíbel.

chapter.title: Porqué esta preguntándome para desinstalar varios programas á vez?
chapter.para: Sometimes if you try to remove one item, Software Center will warn you that other items will be removed too. There are two main reasons this happens.

listitem.para: Se elimina un aplicativo, todos os engadidos e complementos para dito aplicativo tamén van seren eliminados.

Multiple applications are sometimes provided as a single package. If any of them are installed, all of them are installed. And if any of them are removed, all of them are removed. Software Center cannot remove them individually, because it has no instructions on how to separate them.

chapter.para: You can use the Main Menu settings to hide unwanted items without removing them from the computer. In GNOME, you can find Main Menu inside System Preferences.

chapter.title: Que facer se un programa que desexamos non está dispoñíbel?
chapter.para: Primeiro comprobe que estea seleccionado Ver Todo o software.
If the software you want still isn’t there, but you know that it runs on this operating system, try contacting the original developers of the program to ask if they can help make it available.
If a program is available for other operating systems but not for this one, let the developers know that you’re interested in running it on this operating system.

chapter.title: Que sucede se un programa non funciona?
chapter.para: With tens of thousands of programs in Software Center, there’s always the chance that a few of them won’t work properly on your computer.

If you are familiar with reporting bugs in software, you can help out by reporting the problem to the developers, see http://www.debian.org/Bugs/Reporting for information on how to report a bug in Debian. If you do not run Debian, but a distribution based on it, you might need to report the bug to another address.
Otherwise, look through Software Center for another program to do what you want.
